CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: <aft> MOT kisses CHI on the head and hugs her affectionately
<bef> MOT looks at the camera briefly
Lexie and Lex are names that MOT uses for CHI

<bef> INV explains the warm-up task to MOT . it was necessary for INV to go out in the hall before CHI would enter the room . MOT gives CHI some playing cards out of her bag to keep CHI amused and then kneels on the floor with CHI . INV leaves the room
MOT lets go of CHI and reaches for something in her bag
MOT looks down at the card in CHI's hand
MOT taps her finger on the card in CHI's hand
MOT fixes her bag on the chair and then sits on the floor
CHI looks at MOT and smiles
MOT points to the wall . <aft> MOT looks at CHI
MOT points to the wall and looks at CHI
CHI has continued looking at MOT with a subtle smile on her face until this time
MOT points to the wall and looks at CHI
MOT turns CHI around to face the wall
CHI looks at MOT grinning broadly
CHI looks around the room and hands the cards to MOT
MOT takes the cards from CHI
CHI looks down at the cards
CHI looks where MOT pointed to
MOT puts the cards up on the chair
CHI looks at the book on the floor
MOT starts rummaging through her bag
CHI walks over to the book on the floor
MOT still looks through her bag
CHI stares at the book on the floor
<bef> MOT takes a book out of her bag
CHI turns and looks at MOT
CHI takes a few steps towards MOT
<aft> MOT opens the cover of the book
CHI looks up at the wall

CHI turns and looks at the chair slowly and then turns back to face MOT again
MOT leans forward slightly and looks at CHI
CHI turns and looks at the toys on the floor
CHI walks over to the toys on the floor and picks up the toy duck
CHI gives the toy duck it MOT
CHI walks around the room aimlessly
MOT holds out the toy duck and squeezes it
CHI walks back over to the toys on the floor

CHI looks up at the pictures on the wall

as MOT points to the wall the toy duck falls off her lap

INV leaves the room while Small Scale Activity takes place and re-enters at 14:19:45
INV explains the Forbidden Object task to MOT and takes away the toys that CHI had in her hands . MOT and CHI are sitting on the floor

INV takes the object out of the drawer

MOT comforts CHI and talks to INV
INV tells MOT about Parent Child Interaction Boxes . INV picks up the toys from Small Scale Activity . CHI sits on MOT's lap and CHI and looks at the book . CHI watches INV closely
